about_the_game:
This story may change because of under development. Story is that thief robot try to steal many things.

It is a chase game. You can escape from enemy with various Power up item.

- You can be experienced ThirdpersonCamera. You can controll character just a keyboard.
- Playable character's speed is slow. Enemy become stronger, so you fight against it by doing power up.
- This game has some goal condition. For example, gimmick release and time durability.
- 3d game.

You can make video and stream about this game regardless of returns. If you will do that, Please post a link for this game.

name: Pitta

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
